mapper.sql: id as id, name as name, acl as acl, url as url, sort_no as sortNo, parent_id as parentId
mapper.select: select sm.id as id,sm.acl as acl,sm.icon as icon,sm.parent_id as parentId,sm.name as name,sm.url as url from sys_user u join sys_user_role sur on u.id = sur.user_id join sys_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.id join sys_role_privilege srp on srp.role_id = sr.id join sys_privilege sp on srp.acl = sp.acl join sys_menu sm on sm.acl = sp.acl join sys_menu smp on sm.parent_id = smp.id join sys_organization so on sr.org_id = so.id where u.id = #{userId} and sot.code = #{orgCode}
